text: I’m glad I ended up not showing up to this. I proceeded to have flu like symptoms for the next week (pretty sure it was either flu or corona, guess we’ll never know since its almost impossible to get tested) and have since recovered, pass it to my wife who’s now halfway into recovery, etc. I’m glad I didn’t pass this to y’all!
